Text:
I have this and REALLY thank the uploader, but does anybody have the VHS conversion of this that had the song "19th Nervous Breakdown" on it? It was done in the middle of the concert when they were on the small stage. TY
Also, if you don't have this, get it. First Class!

Pando:
Como decimos aca en Argentina "sos un groso" (que es un elogio por supuesto).
En mi opinion personal es para mi, el mejor de los videos y una de las mejores giras que realizaron.
Espero ansioso poder bajar esta joya para agregarla a mi videoteca musical.
Muchas gracias por la subida!!!
